DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate kallikreins substrate , CCN , COPD patient . Kallikreins subgroup serine protease , enzyme able cleave peptide bond protein . Kallicrein profile unkonwn COPD . The investigator assess Kallikrein 1 15 CCN 1 6 sputum patient . Three group patient include : Healthy smoker subject , stable COPD patient COPD patient acute exacerbation . Kallicrein level sputum compare group .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria healthy subject : Smoker tobacco consumption 20 pack/year Normal lung function test Exclusion Criteria healthy subject : diagnosis lung disease study Asthma Lung cancer Pregnant lactate woman Inclusion Criteria stable COPD : Smoker tobacco consumption 20 pack/year FEV1/FVC < 70 % lung function test hospitalisation exacerbation 3 month inclusion Exclusion Criteria stable COPD : Asthma Lung cancer Pregnant lactate woman Inclusion Criteria COPD exacerbation : Smoker tobacco consumption 20 pack/year worsen pulmonary symptom FEV1/FVC < 70 % lung function test could obtain 3 month exacerbation Exclusion Criteria COPD exacerbation : Asthma Lung cancer Pregnant lactate woman
